import Header from "../components/header" import GetOnePokemonInWeb from "../components/getOnePokemonInWeb" import SavePokemonInDatabase from "../components/savePokemonInDatabase" import GetAllPokemonDB from "../components/getAllPokemonDB" import styles from './styles.css' import { useState,useEffect } from "react" import Cabecalho from "../components/cabecalho" const Dashboard = () => { const [showSave,setShowSave] = useState(false); const [showSearch,setShowSearch] = useState(false) useEffect(()=>{ },[]) const handlerSearch = () => { setShowSearch(true); setShowSave(false) return } const handlerSave = () =>{ setShowSave(true) setShowSearch(false) return } return (
{showSave?
:null}
{showSearch?
:null}
) } export default Dashboard
